data.title: PINKPASTPRESENT
data.text:
PINK: PAST & PRESENT is an award-winning feature length documentary film which explores the rich, vibrant and often turbulent history of Liverpoolâ€™s lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender community. The film features authentic, personal and gripping stories from the 1950s to the present day. The trailer of the documentary, which you can watch below, premiered at Homotopia and screened at FACT as part of Liverpool Pride 2012.

Here on the PINK: PAST & PRESENT website, you can view a video resource full of stories relating to themes such as the 1980s, coming out, life on the ships and much more! You can also view photos that have been shared with us and access links to organisations that provide help and support.
